main event: Three separate police units observed an unknown airborne object over Bedford, Virginia, on November 20, 1965.
interesting points: The object was first sighted at approximately 3 miles north of Bedford, moving against a 35 knot wind,The object was described as round, brighter than a star, and diminished in size as it disappeared over the horizon,Multiple witnesses reported the object changing colors from white to orange and exhibiting an on-and-off lighting pattern, The object was sighted for approximately 50 minutes, and there was no radar contact made with any aircraft during the time of the sighting.
